history.proof: srun best use: Permutation_in unfold: incl.

original: intros X l m2 m1 H1 H2. intros H3 H4. apply (incl_tran _ m2 _). apply H3. apply (incl_tran _ (m1 ++ m2) _). apply (incl_app_rinv m1 m2 nil). exists m1, m2. split. + apply Perm_trans with (m1 ++ m2). apply Permutation_app_comm. apply Permutation_app_comm. + split. apply incl_refl. apply incl_nil_l. apply H4.
